item.title: Nat King Cole - It's only a paper moon
item.description:
It is only
a paper moon
Hanging over
a cardboard sea
But it wouldn’t be
make believe
If you believed
in me
It is only
a canvas sky
Sailing over
a muslin tree
But it wouldn’t be
make believe
If you believed in me
without your love
It’s a
honky-tonk parade
Without your love
It’s a melody
Played in a
penny arcade
It’s a barnum
and bailey world
Just as phony as
it can be
But it wouldn’t be
make believe
If you believed
in me-

Without your love
It’s a honky-tonk
Parade
without your love
It’s a melody played
in a penny arcade
It’s a barnum and
bailey world
Just as phony
as it can be
But it wouldn’t
be make believe
If you believed
in me-

item.title: Nat King Cole - LOVE
item.description:
L is for the way
you look at me
O is for the
only one I see
V is very very
extraordinary
E is even more
than anyone
that you
adore can
Love is all that
I can give to you
Love is more than
just a game for two
Two in love can
make it Take my heart
and please
don’t break it
Love was made
for me and you

L is for the way
you look at me

Love was made
for me and you
